headline: Many Media Companies Aren’t Thriving. Their CEOs Are Paid a Lot.
summary: With all the swirling media news lately—  Warner Bros. Discovery’s  and  Comcast’s  planned spinoffs, Paramount looking to merge with Skydance,  Walt Disney  buying the rest of Hulu—there is much uncertainty surrounding legacy media.  One thing is certain though, the CEOs orchestrating all this will get paid.

headline: 3 Stocks to Watch From a Challenging Cable Television Industry
summary: Zacks Cable Television industry participants like CMCSA, CHTR and NPSNY are benefiting from growing demand for high-speed Internet and increased media consumption amid cord-cutting.

headline: Here is What to Know Beyond Why Comcast Corporation (CMCSA) is a Trending Stock
